name: Greedy Gustav
description:
You are greedy. You are Gustav. You want all treasures for yourself.  Therefore you travel around the world visit to all museums and grow your collection!

My entry for the 4. Pizza Game Jam. Topic: One of the Seven Deadly Sins

Take your telescopic hook and sneak around obstacles and guards! But don't hit your cable or any other obstacle!

Grab guards and make your way without activating the alarm!


Special thanks to Sam for drawing that custom cover, seen in the main menu and to  my friends, whose pictures I used to decorate!
